subject: Sexual Health
title: The Prostate Gland
description: Learn The Prostate Gland in one minute.

hook.text: A walnut-sized gland sits below the bladder and plays a vital role most men never think about.

buildup.text: The prostate surrounds the urethra, the tube that carries both urine and semen out of the body.

discovery.text: It produces a milky fluid that nourishes sperm and makes up about 30% of total semen volume.

twist.text: After age 50, the prostate often enlarges, squeezing the urethra and causing urinary problems.

climax.text: This small gland is essential for fertility yet becomes a common health concern in aging men.

punchline.text: Tiny gland, big role, and a common trouble spot.

quiz.question: What does the prostate gland produce?
